articles.title: High blood sugar elevates COVID-19 mortality risk: Chinese study - CGTN
articles.description: Patients with abnormally high blood sugar levels are more than twice as likely to die from COVID-19, researchers in China said on Saturday.
articles.content:
Patients with abnormally high blood sugar levels are more than twice as likely to die from COVID-19, researchers in China said on Saturday.
